text: ‘ na seth.
galla ki්radanganaye ki්radagara anthaye sita digin digatama pandu yawu yasir sha ada dinaye pakisthanuwan yawu oowara 56 n oowara 23.1 kma yawiya.
parisara sanwidhana penwa dena andamata mulu mahath lokayama dadi niyan thaththwayakata muhuna demin sitithi.
edatawath hamba wenna enna kiyala chandana liyum wala liyala thibuna.
ethakota apith adawiya patin sarasannam!
in pasuwa rate aarakshaka lekamwaraya gos ema ghathakayata aarakshawada sapayanawa.
man dan thama oyege blog eke mulma lipiya baluwe..
ethumage sangitha bhawithayangen wenasma aakarayakata hadichch githayak kiyala me githaya handunwanna puluwan .
"lanwela baluwoth andala thiyenne kurutu.
habayi gamaka nam manussayek gedarakata gihin bo karanawa harenawata geyin geta bo karana prawanathawaya aduyi.
mula di aarn (්raba* ge abhimathartha ha nyaya patha්raya kumak dayi hari hati pahadili nuna da, 80 ganan wala mul kalaya wana wita ohu mulu ka්riyawaliyama sawimath kala bawa nam sathyayaki.
eeye awasthawadiyo kadayak gini thabuha.ada ude alu wechcha kadeta gihin minissu balanakota mala sirurak hamuwiya.ee sirura me tharunayageya.
ma melesin pahath wada kaloth unwahansetath athwanne awamanayakayi salaka waradin midiya hakiya.thawada dayada mahanthathwaya gana salaka waradin midiya hakiya.
oya dan hoda lamaya wage hinawela inna
chandrikata ada deshapalanaye kala haki deyak natha.
reda potha nokale umbaa niyama kollek nisa.
ado dannan kimbaullu witharak neme, oya nalu niliyoth athe gahapu ti shart thiyanawa oonatharam hik hik.
eeth hadapu dawase dekenam niyameta wada.
kisiwaku mage nama kiya ka gasuweya.
eekath jaya siri mangalam kiwwalu ehenam....wena monawa kiyannada?
ema samagame aarambhaka adhyakshawaraya wanne janaka prasanna dehiwala liyanage hewath chathurika sirisenage ‘red cheri’hi aarambhaka adhyakshawarayaku ha kotas himikaruwa wana pudgalayamaya.

ehi ohu pawasa sitiye, “…api ape game bauddha janathawath samanga sahayogayen jiwath wenne ape game bauddha swamin wahansela dawasak apen illa sitiya idiriyata udawena (wesak ho poson (ohuta ema dinaya nishchitha natha)) uthsawayata samangamiwa muslim sinhala apa deparshawaya ekwa ek wadasatahanak karamu yanuweni.
eeka ahala ara manussayage hitha bindena ekakuth na ethakota.

'sanwedi thorathuru' lesin wigraha karamin maha bankuwa bandumkara sambandha thorathuru labadima prathikshepa kara thibu namuth parlimenthuwata thorathuru labadima prathikshepa kirimata kisiwekutath ayithiyak nathi bawayi kop kamituwe pradhani sunil handunneththi manthriwaraya bibisi sandeshayata kiya sitiye.
anagathaya sukhitha mudika kara ganime chethanane adu wayasinma ithaliyata pamini aya age kamaraye palikawa wana wishakage malanuwan samanga wiwaha giwisagena sitiyi.
mage uchcharanaya harida manda, eeth eeka mata ahune menna mehema.
hamme mame....ayi me kolawari di habata?

ara manussaya eekata kalinma lasthi wela nottuwath dik karagenayi hitiye."kiribathgodata"kondosthara salli nogena tikak wela balagena hitiya."ayi ankal kiribathgodata yanna ochchara salli denne?"me manussaya ...

man hummiti nothiyama nihanga una.
@mathalan nalin silwata anuwa ee dekata deshiya widihak nadda?
(mama danna tharamin oya dewal tika thamayi thiyenne..
man hama widihatama andinawa.
ee nisa puluwan dewal karagena innawa.
oya padam kirima mama athulu ape panthiye set ekata dirawanne na ookata podi lesi kramayak hoya gaththa (hoyagaththa kiwwata isskole giya hama kenekma mema kramaya athhada balanna athi.)
onna oya hethuwa nisa thamayi api saha fedararla wenas wenne.
na na ee tika hari...
wisi weni shathawarshe sangithaya kiyanne ehempitinma kwontom bhauthikaya.
loku akkath, ayiyath maniketh inne kolambaa..
api wage sinhala witharak danna ayage ingiris gana ithin kawara kathada !!
eke mema widhanaya athulath kara
wisheshayen nakals rakshitha wananthara bhumiya samipayehi gammana aashrithawa kumbauru akkara wishala pramanayak pawathina athara, eewa aswadimada abhiyogayak wi atha.
antanita pala yannata baththalangunduwa thibunada, apata pala yannata ewan kodewwakwath ithiri nowana bawa pahadiliya.
man kawu da?

aagama rajya palanayen wenkirima, ingrisi bhashawa wani jathyanthara bhashawak bhawitha kirima diriganwana gaman anonya bhasha igenaganimata unandukirima, tharunye nidahasa bhukthiwidimata pahasukam salasima, aadiye idan jathiwadi prakasha karannan mardhanaya kirima wenakanma wiwida kriyamarga me sadaha yodagatha hakiyi..
mage deshanawalata digatama ahum kandenna..
dan thibena piriwen bahutharaya hithumanape oonama kenekuta igenuma labiya haki, mona ma aakarayenwath waradak penwa diya nohaki, awasanawantha aayathana samuhayaki.
ejapayath samanga aandu karannata nila sha්rilanipaya katayuthu kirimen thawath watayakin darunu kale mema sankirna thaththwayamaya.
chems da alwisge dayakathwaya nuthana sahithya kshethraya sambandha adhyayanayakadi nishchithawa dakwa limata nohaki nam me paryeshanaya kale kumak arabayada?
amerika eksath janapadaye kolombiya wishwawidyalayedi aayojanaya pilibanda deshanayak pawathwamin woran bafet mathakadi kiya sitiye mewannaki.
eewa sathyaya siddiyen madak bahara wiya haki bawa karunawen salakanna.
prawruththi adhyaksha epa ki aarakshaka pradhani ath adanguwata ganimata rahas polisiyata oona
ee anuwa 1875 desambarayedi kolambaa waraya kruthrima warayak bawata path karamin birathanya kirula himi wels kumaru (hathwana engwang raju) athin niritha diga diyakadanaya sandaha mulgal thabini.
jiniwa wala wenne makkado kiya, parlimenthuwe inna unuth nodanna eke, mati mol jaha manaya, melo malahaththilawwak wath danne nathiya.
lowa boho ratawala aparadha sambandhayen awadhanayen pasuwana amerika eksath janapadayema hamudawata ellawana lingika chodana sulukota thakiya nohakke ee hindayi.

meka sidda wune pasale sportmit pawathwena dawaswala.anith dawaswalata wada nidahasa wadipura labena dawas kihipayak nisa punchi nidahasath monawahari asamajjathi wadakata yodaganna ape un pasubata une na.mamayi ape thawa dennekuyi pasale widyagarayata tikak ehayin thibuna padipela dige pahalata bahagena enawa.oya athare thiyanawa athaharala dapu pasalata ayithi parana wasikiliyak.
pi.ji.ayi.em aාyathanaya gana yam adahasak mata labenne 1995 wasarediya.
obe aayudha bimadamanna!

kasina bhawanawa jiwithaya anithyaya asaraya asubhaya
kenekuta nagitinnata atha dime monama pasubamakwath natha.
chandarayatath mala panala masayak withara wilbage muna baluweth na.
atham welawata ohu hithanawa mewa thaman karapu akusala kriyawanhi wipaka nedayi?
malingage wishesha awasthawan wala chayarupa kihipayak
apith koti walige wage eeka allagaththa.
alena eewa...”ranil thallu karaththaya langa sita ugura ridena thek ka gaweya.

niyojya amathiwaraya ek paththakin pas jawaramwalata, galkori pawathwagena yamata erehiwa kriyamarga noganima sambandhayen pradeshiya lekamwariyata banawadina, tharjanaya karana athara anek paththen disthrik lekamwariyagen illa sitinne siya hithawathunge pas kapime balapathra dirgha karana lesayi.
bayisikalaye yakada goda uda
mama nidarshanayak kiyannam liyakata anayak gahuwoth thadin ee anaya liyehi kagena hellenne nathiwa thadin pawathinawa.
umbaata thama mawa hariyatama therum ganta puluwan.
daruwo dan inna than gana obata sathutuyi da?
widya wa pilibandawa thibu unanduwa yamkisi pramanayakata aduwi aagama pilibanda karunu walata minisa nambauru wi athi bawak daknata labuni.
mitiyawathak pasu karamin sakman karana wita durgayak hamuwenawa.
awashya wanne ka්riyawen dewa rajyayata kapawimayi.
aagamika uthsawa sadaha sahabhagiwime awastha yomu weyi.
pesapa sayirisa sanwidhanaye “nagima pilibanda adhyanaya kirima” pa්ramukha katayuththak lesa niwedaya kara thibe.
eeth passe eya eekata kamathibawa matadanuna.
ehemath nathinam tawal eka kamare athule redi rak eke hondata diga arala dala, janelayak arala thiyannath puluwan.
mage birindata rakiyawak naha.

ema uthsawayata el.bi. finans aayathanaye kalamanakarana adhyaksha sumith aadihetti mahathada, pasale widuhalpathi athulu guru mandalaya, pasale aadi shishya sangamaya, el.bi. finans aayathanaye sewaka madulla saha shri lanka krikat kandayame kusal mendis, dhananjaya da silwa, isuru udana, lahiru kumara saha anjalo perera yana kridakayoda sahabhagi wuha.

ek ek hamudawala awenika lakshana saha ek ek ek rejimenthuwala awenika lakshana pilibandawa wenamama lipiyakin wisthara kirimata balaporoththu wenawa.

api bhumiye thani ayithiya gana hithana eka waradiyi..eeth me gamwala inne gowithanin jiwath wena duppath minissune....
maha thapana yanu da, me narakaya ta namaki.
owun idiriye pahara kanne aabadithayeku bawa owunta amathaka wi giya seya.
ammata , nandammata, nandata, kiri ammata eya thiranaya karannata nodi, saba pirimiyeku lesa eya obe ganu lamayata wedya upades matha thoraganna ida dima oba sathu kariyaki.
thawa dennekta sahakarayo hoyamin pawathinawaekkenek nathiwima gana kanagatuyi..

sangitha, chithra, prathamika anshaya, gruha widya, thorathuru thakshana, krida, pusthakala, widyagara aadi ansha gananawakata ayath boho bhanda pramanayak owun wetha ragena yannata tharam ape aarthika shakthiya pramanawath wuweya.
(wideshiya liyapadinchi thapal gasthuwa athulathwa)
dan ee paththa sudu wela.
ee nisa thamange hithumatheta wada karanna puluwan thaththwayak ada ohuta naha.
ebawin samasthaya danahisa prathisthapanaya kirime wiyadama indiyawa swayankriyawa wadiwe.
’ara inne ara’ lipiye palamuwani kotasen obata mulika awabodhayak labennata athi, bhumiye pihiti wasthuwak thawath kenekuta penwadenne kohomada kiyana eka pilibandawa.

ee wagema me peththe athurupalayak widiyata ange idimimak ena nisa , meka mahathwimak widiyata waradiyata therum ganimath ekka , tharuna parapure samahara daruwan me stiroyid pethi kisindu kramawedayakata nathiwa adhimathra washayen ekathu karala hadapu eka eka nam sahitha ‘hora pethi saha guli“ ganna pelambaila innawa.
me lamaya ena kota siti deshakaya pirimiyeki.

siyalu jathiwadi ha prachandakari kriyawan rajayak washayen tharaye hela dakinawa- agamathi siyalu jathiwadi ha prachandakari kriyawan rajayak washayen apa tharaye hela dakina bawath wagakiwa yuthu rajayak washayen mewani nithiwirodhi ha prachanda kriya anumatha kirimata kisidu hakiyawak nomathi bawath jathiwadaya mathin thama aramunu itukaraganimata mana balana deshadrohinge goduru bawata path nowi iwasiliwanthawa, buddhimathwa ha wichakshanashiliwa katayuthu karana lesa agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha ada (6) parlimenthuwe di pawasiya.

mahajanayagen karunu wimasa me dewal karana bawa thama danuwath bawada himiyan danwa sitiya.namuth athipujya thibbatuwawe shri siddhartha sumangala mahanahimiyanta manthri wimal nawatha karunu dakwamin kiya sitiye karunu ese nowana bawath meya jiniwahidi katha karagena karannata yana wadak bawath buddhagama rate pradhana aagama nokara sitinnata pawa wara wayamak rajayata athi bawathya.

rata sanwardhanayedi marga, durakathana, jala pahasukam wage yatithala pahasukam sapayimata samantharawa rata widulikaranaya kirimath ehi wadagath kotasak bawa kiyanna oona.me anuwa idiriye widuliya sandaha athi illuma aniwaryayenma wadiwenawa.
klanthaya saha husma ganime apahasutha.
jiwithaya maha aragalayaki.
e rata jathika wishwawidyala komishame karyaya wanne, me sama wishwawidyalayakama ekakara pa්ramithin pawathwa gena yamayi.
ma dhiwara amathiwarayage kathawa sampurnayenma pahadiliwa liyagena thamayi warthawa liwwe yayi ohu pawasiya.

kunu tika wilpaththuwata yayi...

ma aagam adahannaku no wana bawa dana siti nisa kamathi nam pamanak eyata sahabhagi wana lesa owuhu pawasu ha.
me kadulu sithalayi ..
sangithaya gunadasa kapuge gemaya.
mata ba me karadare thawath windinna.
aakarshanayak “ ohu langa athi bawa nam mata da nokiyama bari ya//onna ookayi aththa thathwe.
yana gaman sisels paththeth yanawayi kiwwa..
ee madida ?"
apa idiriye sitiye yaldewi dumriyedi apa dana handinagath drawida tharunayaya.
oya parana saha aluth wamanshika deshapalanagnyayin gana ho poduwe okkoma desapaluwan gana mage nam aththe pilikulak..
punarbhayawa karmaya [kusal akusal] mathama thiranaya wenne naha wisheshayenma chuthi sitha mathath thiranaya wenawa //..ethakota dalayi lama punaruppathiyak kiyala hasitha kiyanawane..
pudgalika aayathanayaka thorathuru thakshana rakiyawak karanawa.
nisanga prathibhawak kenekuta pihitanne kalathurakini...
wisheshayen mathaka thaba gatha yuthu deyak nam ewani witaka jalashawala pihinima ho snanaya nokaranna.
